item.description:
Since there doesn't appear to be any chance of the rain clearing up, as it did last Saturday, I am cancelling today's ride. I hope you find something else fun to do with your day.

************************************************************

 

Meet at 9 am, Leaving at 9:30 sharp from Cumberland Farms (292 Plymouth Street, Halifax, MA 02338) across from Harmony Two , at the intersection of Routes 106 and 58 in Halifax. 

  Next Stop:  Super Stop and Shop, 141 Main Street, Foxboro, MA 02035 at 10:15, leaving at 10:30.

Apple picking at Bolton Springs Farm. Farmstand, Bakery, Country store with fresh produce, homemade breads, pies, etc, and locally made jams, honey, and other items for your home.  Hayride to the Pumpkin Patch.

$24 for ½ bushel  (20 – 22 lbs).  <note>  (You can split a bushel with a friend or two) Empty saddlebags, bring a milk crate…..

A stop for lunch, then a relaxing ride home.
item.name: Apple Picking CANCELLED : no chance of the rain clearing up
